title: Left Shoe Right Shoe
description: One morning a young boy named Lorenzo meets two sweet creatures in his garden – a yellow ladybug and a red rabbit. When they settle near his shoes, Lorenzo quickly realizes that they are no ordinary ladybug or rabbit. The rabbit makes a special wish and soon the three friends are on their way to a new adventure. This lighthearted story cleverly introduces the concept of “left” and “right” while delighting young children with a magical story of friendship and wonder. (ages 2-6)
author: Yolanda Lopez-Rettew
